message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $100 by you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $120 for it. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects the value we place on maintaining strong relationships with our customers. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, allowing you to enjoy the benefits of the product while also compensating us appropriately for our efforts and resources. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
